column1: length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep midwicket, the deep square leg fielder cuts it off but not before the batsmen collect three
length ball around off, punched firmly from the back foot but straight towards extra cover
fuller and drifting in, worked away behind square leg
length outside off, looks to force it through covers off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge towards short third man
length ball on the stumps, flicked away towards short midwicket

but Gunathilaka manages a boundary, even though a bit streaky. Was a touch fuller outside off, Gunathilaka looked to smash it over covers but ended up slicing behind point, the short third man puts in the chase, and the slide but cannot prevent the boundary
fuller on the stumps, and clicked away towards deep midwicket, the deep square leg does the tidying up
fuller but down the leg side, misses the flick, called a wide
length ball at the stumps, uses his feet to skip down the track and looks to go over midwicket, a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball around off, sashays down the wicket and flat-bats it, fails to get the timing right though as it falls short of mid-off
wayward! Fuller and way, way down the leg side, Sarfaraz had no chance to get to that. Five wides for Sri Lanka
length ball outside off, punched from the crease but cannot beat the extra cover fielder
slower length ball but on the pads, helped towards the right of short fine leg
short of length outside off, stays beside the line and dabs it towards third man
and he goes for a four first ball. A touch fuller on the leg stump and flicked over backward square leg, one bounce and over the boundary line
beats the bat. Length ball and slanting across, Samarawickrama was on the move already looks to push at it and misses
and again, Samarawickrama once again comes on the front foot but Amir has rolled his fingers over it this time, looks to work towards third man and misses

dropped by Sarfaraz. Was a length ball outside off, Samarawickrama looks to guide it fine, can only get an edge, Sarfaraz goes one-handed to his right, wasn't far from him but he was wrong-footed there, gets his glove but doesn't stick
length ball around off and defended from the crease

bowled'im! Amir roars, a mix of aggression and frustration on his face. And it's Gunathilaka, the in-form batsman. Was a length ball around off, Gunathilaka looks to smash it down the ground, gets an inside edge on to the stumps
length ball on the stumps, comes forward and flicks it towards square leg
length ball angling across, looks to dab it away, misses
short of length outside off, goes for the cut, a fumble there by the cover fielder
fuller on the stumps, skips down and chips it over midwicket

another drop! Length ball on the stumps, looks to go over mid-off, gets a top edge towards mid-off, two fielders converging and it's Shadab who settles under... and spills. Babar was perhaps too close to him but this should have been taken

length ball around off and drifting in, Samarawickrama was stuck in his crease, looks to flick it on the leg side and misses. Trapped right in front and an easy decision for the umpire. Would have gone on to hit middle and leg
fuller around off, pushed gently towards covers
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards deep square leg
length ball around middle and off, opens himself up a little bit to flick it towards square leg
length ball around off, a slower one at 122.kph, Rajapaksa drops it at his feet and looks to sneak in a single, Amir was quick to the ball
slower length ball outside off, pushes it towards point from the back foot

fuller around off, looked like another slower ball, Rajapaksa flicks it aerially towards deep-backward square leg, but a brilliant catch by Asif Ali there at the boundary, takes it overhead and balances himself to stay inside. Dropping sitters and taking blinders, that's Pakistan for you
starts with a length ball on the pads and flicked to the right of short third man, the fielder dives but cannot reach there
what a shot! Length ball around off, Fernando stands in his crease and just extends his arms to loft it down the ground, holds the pose it sails all the way
a slower yorker around off, Fernando opens the face to guide it towards third man, and they scamper back for the second, brilliant running
length outside off, dabs it towards third man, only one this time
short of length outside off, pushes at it, was in the air for a while, dribbles towards third man
a slower one but way too outside off, doesn't bounce much either. Could have been a wide but lucky to get away with it
length ball around off, pushes it towards cover-point
length ball, comes down the ground but is nowhere near the pitch, looked like a googly as well. Gets his pad in the way
tossed up around off, clears his front leg and smashes it past the non-striker
short of length around off, some turn there as well, pulls it towards deep midwicket
another googly, goes for the pull but it hurries on to him, a single to long-on
length ball around off, looks to scoop but ends up hitting it towards short midwicket
fuller and wider outside off, looks to drive through covers, a thick outside edge towards third man
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards short midwicket
length ball around off, dabs it towards backward point and sets off, Shadab charges it the ball, gets low and underarms it at the stumps. A direct hit would have been pretty close
short of length and pulled away behind square leg
short of length outside off, steered to the right of the third man, Iftikhar makes a sliding stop to keep it to two

length ball around off, opens the face to work it towards deep backward point, they are coming back for the second but the throw is flat and Sarfaraz whips off the bails. Perera was dragging his bat but was well short of his crease, as replays confirm
fuller outside off, looks to late cut it but it's too full, misses
fuller around off, pushes it towards wide long-off for one
length ball around off, some loop and turn to beat the forward push
length ball around off, comes forward and pushes it towards covers
fuller on the stumps, flicks it towards long-on
length ball on the stumps, pushed towards long-on for another single
a touch fuller on the leg stumps, skips down the track and lofts it over mid-off, dribbles towards the boundary
back-to-back four. Short of length down the leg side, pulled fine and that's four more for Fernando as he races away to 26 off 13
length ball at the batsman, stays back and turns it in front of square leg
length ball in the channel, looks to guide it to third man, misses
length ball around off, tucked away in front of square leg for another single in that area
fuller around off, a lofted drives down the ground but only a single
short of a length outside off, cuts firmly to point who is told to take a few steps back by the captain
length on off stump, on the back foot and pushes into the vacant midwicket region
length on off, defended on the front foot
length ball tossed up outside off, watchfully pushed to point on the rise
missed stumping. Full ball drifted down leg. He's out of the crease and has lost balance as he tries to flick. Sarfraz can't gather the ball
length outside off, gets low and opens the face to run this to short third
length ball slanted into off stump. Shapes for the drive but is forced to drop this into the pitch from the crease
oh nicely driven with the turn. Length ball drifted into off stump and he gets forward to the pitch of this and goes inside-out, flat and to long-off's left
full on off stump, jabbed with the turn between deep extra cover and long-off
full at off stump, gets down and paddles this straight to short fine
lifts it over extra cover. They brought that fielder back in and he's lifted it exactly there. Full one on off stump and he just allowed that to come on and opened the face late
length on off stump, nudged to cover's right off the front foot
length on off stump, defended down the pitch
full and slanted into leg stump. Flicked to deep midwicket on the front foot
tossed up at a length outside off, runs down at it but is forced to defend into the covers as that holds its line
length and just outside off, stabbed back down the pitch off the back foot
length and turning away outside off. Steps out and turns his wrists to drag this into the vacant midwicket region
beaten. Short of a length and sliding away outside off. Looks for the cut and that is rapidly past the bat
length and turning away from just outside off. Slowed that down. Can't do more than defend that into the off side
length on leg stump, flicked deftly with the angle to deep square's right
short of a length on leg stump, dabbed down to fine leg off the hips
short and wide outside off, left alone
short of a length and slanted across the corridor. Steps into the off side and tries to whip this. Cops it on the thigh guard
beaten. Short and cutting away in the corridor. Looks to glide that with the angle to third man
slower bouncer just outside off. It's dug in too short, and he doesn't even attempt to hit that as it climbs past the right shoulder
short ball down leg side this time. Shuffles and looks to flick that and it is past his hip.
short of a length outside off, stays back in the crease and looks to chop this down to third man. Beaten
length and just outside off. Steps out and stabs it to sweeper cover
outside edge runs past the short third man fielder. Full outside off, looks to drive through the covers and is beaten by the flight and turn. Good ball, but gets four nonetheless
short of a length on middle stump, punched to deep midwicket off the back foot

well fielded. Asif Ali sprinting to his right at long-off, getting his body onto this firmly struck drive with a dive. It then richochets backwards and he recovers to leap at it before it can touch the boundary padding. It was a length ball and he stepped out to meet that
short outside off, under-edged cut to deep extra
length at leg stump, flicked to short fine's left

fifty on debut for Oshada. Started the night with ten runs off his first two balls after coming into the middle of a collapse. He's been freeflowing and stylish all evening. Dabs this short of a length ball down to fine leg
short of a length and wide outside off. Slapped off the front foot to sweeper cover
beaten. Short and slanted across off stump. Looks to ramp it to third man and is beaten by pace
full toss at knee height in the corridor. Driven off the sticker of the bat to extra cover
bouncer is dug in too short. Ducks under that

dropped at deep square. Short ball on middle stump, whips it off the front foot and gets it to Asif Ali's right. He's lost the ball - or some of his vision - in the floodlight and therefore has to force a dive to his right in the end. Too difficult by then

dropped at third man. Shinwari has over-run. Short of a length ball across the corridor. Has a hack across the line and gets a leading edge to the fielder's right. But he takes one step too many as he strides that way and in the end has to grab at this behind his body. Puts it down and then scrambles to try and keep this from touching the boundary line. Does that part right
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Cut straight to sweeper cover

missed run-out and an overthrow at fine leg to boot. Overpitched ball on off stump. Driven along the floor to mid-off and gives up on the run. Ifthikar takes his time with the throw but can't hit the stumps
slower ball, full and very wide outside off. Left alone
clears long-on! It came off the inside half of the bat but he's managed to get it over the fielder. Length ball on leg stump, wanted to offer the full face and loft this straight

appeal for catch behind turned down. Pakistan have reviewed. Full ball just outside off and angling away. He looks to jam that down to third man and it goes through to the keeper. He jammed the bat into the ground, but was there an edge too? No there wasn't. Ball was quite a way away

fumbled and that goes over the boundary. Overpitched ball on leg stump. Keeps the feet rooted and whips it behind square. Fakhar Zaman sprints to his right from deep square and stretches his right hand out at this. It's a good effort till then, but then he can't hold onto it and bounces off his body past the boundary
lovely slower ball. It's full on off stump and he's looking to drill into the leg side as this loops and dips from under the bat
length ball just outside off, steps out and looks to slap this through the off side. Gets it off the high part of the bat to mid-off
dragged just over deep square. Incredible hands. This is short of a length and pushed across him. He plants his back leg across and reaches out well in front of his body to whip across the line
low full ball outside off, driven to extra cover and a direct hit at the non-striker's end would have had him
beaten. Short of a length outside off, looks to slog across the line but loses his shape
short and very wide outside off. He backs into the leg side but he wouldn't have reached that in any case
slammed into his thigh. Length ball wide outside off. Jumps into its line, gets on his knee and tries to ramp this. It's brave, but it's not effective

taken at sweeper cover! Lovely execution of the dive from Fakhar. Short of a length outside off. Looks to carve it through the off side, ends up floating it some ten yards in front of the fielder. He sprints in and to his left before jumping out and grabbing it aerially. Slides neatly to hold on
slower ball, short of a length and just outside off. Squares him up a touch and he has to drop this pitch side in the off side
swept to the long leg boundary! That is smart. And so skillful. Both square fielders in the circle n the leg side. He gets down at this offcutter outside off and lifts it over them
wide yorker outside off. Looks to chop that down to third man and is beaten
lobbed harmlessly into the midwicket area. Short ball cramps him at chest height as he looks for the pull off the front foot. Couldn't control the shot at all
full slower ball on middle stump, drilled firmly back down the pitch and into the bowler's path. He gets something on that to stop it

taken at mid-off! Ifthikar pedals backwards and to his left and keeps his balance nicely. Full ball at the stumps. He looks to lift this straight but the bat turns in his hand and he ends up slicing it just over the fielder
just stabbed over mid-off! That is a lovely shot. Short of a length ball on the stumps. Backs away and makes room and then a short-arm stab on the up to clear the fielder
full on leg stump, looks to slug that into the leg side, but it comes off the thick inside edge. Straight to square leg
low full toss just outside off, wants to go inside-out and possibly over extra cover, but can't turn those wrists quickly enough. Gets it straight to long-off
nicely bowled. Yorker length at middle stump, whipped on the full out to deep midwicket where Babar fumbles but Sri Lanka not alert to the second run
yorker length on leg stump, backs away and jams it off the toe-end down to long-on

sent upstairs for the run out and this should be out too. Yes it is. Sticks to the pattern, a wicket off the sixth ball! But a lovely ball before that. A yorker right up at middle stump. He can't do more than keep that from hitting the stumps. It rolls near the crease and Shinwari is quickly onto it to hit the stumps with a flick
what a start, what a delivery. Length ball on the stumps, shapes back in to beat the bat, hits the batsman on the thigh before crashing on to the stumps
fuller on the stumps this time, pushes it towards mid-on
fuller again but wide outside off, reaches out for it, gets his bat to it but that's all, the ball doesn't go anywhere
fuller around off, a hint of inswing, flicked towards the straight-ish short midwicket
length ball outside off, steers it towards third man to get Pakistan off the mark
length ball around off, comes forward and punches it towards mid-on, right from the middle of the bat but straight towards the fielder
length ball outside off, punched through covers, two fielders behind it and a bit of teamwork near the deep extra cover boundary keeps it to three
length ball outside off, goes for the pull but doesn't middle it, gets a couple to deep square leg
length ball outside off, stands tall and taps it towards covers
length ball on the pads, flicked away towards square leg
length ball on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
length outside off, driven on the up, from the middle of the bat, but finds the extra cover
length ball angling in towards the batsman, tucked away towards square leg
length ball outside off, punched towards the right of mid-off on the up
fuller and wider outside off, opens the face of the bat but cannot beat the point fielder
fuller outside off again, clears his front leg and looks to smash it through the off side, the ball hits the toe end of the bat and rolls towards mid-off
a slower one, Haris was once again looking to give himself some room, a powerful cut but an excellent diving stop by the point fielder
a full toss on the off stump, Haris is perhaps surprised and can only bunt it back towards the bowler
length ball outside off, swats it towards extra cover
length ball on the stumps, pushed back towards the bowler
the first boundary for Pakistan. A touch wider this time and Babar goes over extra cover this time, utilising the angle
length ball, Babar skips down the track before whipping it towards midwicket
fuller this time, Haris skips down and lofts it inside-out over extra cover, first six of the chase
and again, dances down and hits it inside out over cover this time, 15 from that over to lift the chase
length ball outside off, punched but straight to the cover
length outside off, goes for the cut but it doesn't bounces as much as Babar was expects, sneaks under the bat. The keeper collects it on the volley
fuller outside off, driven from the crease but mid-off to cut it off to his left
fuller on the stumps, driven firmly but straight towards mid-on
slower length ball outside off, opens the face at the last moment to guide it towards third man
fuller around off, looks to drive but the ball hits the inner half, a quick single to mid-on
backs away, showing the bowler his stumps, the bowler follows Babar with a low full toss on the pads, flicked behind square leg
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
a slower one, fuller on the stumps, flicked away towards the left of deep square leg
length ball around off, stands tall and punches it towards long-on
fuller around off, digs it out towards extra cover
length ball outside off, skips down and towards the leg side to punch it over extra cover. Nine from that over but Pakistan still scoring at less than run a ball
fuller on the pads, flicked away towards deep square leg
fuller on the pads, tucked away past short midwicket, Sandakan comes across from deep square leg to cut it off
slower length ball on the channel, Haris was early into the drive and gets beaten
another slower one, fuller outside off, flicked away behind square leg
short of length outside off, opens the face of the bat to guide it down to third man
a full toss on the stumps, Haris presents the full face of the bat, was in the air but just evades the outstretched right hand of the bowler and races away towards the straight boundary
fuller on the stumps, digs it out towards long-on
tossed up fuller outside off, flicks it wide of long-on and comes back for the second
fuller again, flicked towards deep midwicket with the turn, straight towards the fielder this time
fuller on the stumps, looks to force it towards wide long-on, misses and is hit on the pads
fuller outside off, comes forward and drives it towards long-off
length ball around off, stays back and pushes it towards long-on
length ball around off, punched towards long-off from the back foot
fuller on the pads, flicked towards deep midwicket
length outside off, goes for the cut, not from the middle of the bat, a good diving stop by short third man
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards deep point
length ball on the stumps, skids through with the angle, Haris misses the flick as it stays down, might have missed the leg stump though
length but way too outside off, needs to be bowled again
fuller but down the leg side this time, wide again
length ball on the stumps, punched towards long-on
fuller outside off, plays it gently towards cover-point for a quick single
a googly, length outside off, skips down the ground and looks to push, misses and gets hit on the pad. Outside the line of the off stump though
length ball on the pads, tucked away towards square leg for one
fuller around off, clears his front leg and looks to smash down the ground. Not from the middle of the bat though, a single to long-on
length ball on the pads, flicked towards short midwicket
a googly, length outside off, goes for the cut but a good stop there by the point fielder
tossed up outside off, steps out and drives against the turn to long-off
shot! Lobbed up full and friendly outside off. Gets the front leg out, meets it at the pitch and drills this over extra cover
through him. Length ball slides through at shin height. He looks to flick across it but that is past the toe-end
length on middle stump, whipped to deep midwicket's right off the back foot
run-out chance at the non-striker's end. But the throw just a bit too wayward for the bowler to hold on. He was struggling to get back there. This pinged into the leg side off his pad
length on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket
short of a length at middle stump. Pulls forcefully across the line of this, but he mistimes it. Out to deep square
nicely bowled. Yorker length just outside off, backs away, exposes the stumps and is forced to steer this down to third man
slower ball at a length on off stump. Defended on the front foot to point's left
short of a length just outside off, pulled off the front foot to long-on's right
slower ball, short of a length outside off. Looks for the square cut, under-edges it to point's right

taken low to his right! Kumara's persistence and consistency has paid off. He's been very disciplined today. Slams this back of a length and just outside off. Babar backs away, makes room, and tries to chop this down to third man. The outside edge dips to Sadeera's right and he hangs on cleanly
left alone. He thought that was a wide. Short of a length and turning away wide outside off. Just inside the marker
full ball tossed right up outside off. Looks to crunch it through the covers, mistimes and gets it back to the bowler
length on off stump, punched on the up to long-off
length outside off, leans in and flicks to long-on's right. Wants the second as soon as he's hit that and he gets it
short of a length outside off, pushed to extra cover's left off the back foot
length on off stump, nice and slow. He flicks into the vacant square leg region. Short fine and deep square create enough doubt for Haris to refuse the second
offcutter at a length on leg stump, leans in and flicks to deep square's left
length on leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket with the angle
yorker length at middle stump. Backs away and looks to jam it through the off side. Gets it back onto his pads
yorker down leg side. Haris shaped like he was backing away initially and the bowler looked to follow him down leg
fifty for Haris. His second in internationals. An offcutter at length, just outside off. Leans in and flicks to deep midwicket
chipped over the bowler. Wanted to hit that firmly but had to adjust because it was an offcutter. At a length on off. Long-off cleans up to his right
full and n at middle stump, driven to long-on
low full toss on off stump, punched firmly down to long-on
oh well bowled. Nails the yorker just outside off. He backs away and looks for the drive, but that can only roll back down the pitch
atttempted yorker again. Dips away towards the stumps as he backs and looks to slog after meeting it on the full. But that's right off the toe-end and down to long-on
nicely timed. Slower short ball just outside off. Waited for that to skid on and chopped it past backward point, to sweeper's left
full and dipping in at off stump. Driven firmly back at the bowler, who can't get himself untangled quickly enough and ends up pushing this into the covers
low full toss curving away marginally from off stump. Has a swish as this and slices to sweeper's left

you could sense it coming! The wrong'un. Didn't take too much nous to predict Haris would be running down the pitch. Wanindu lands this wide outside off and turns it away from a length. It's also flat, so that languid jump down the pitch is not good enough. Quite a way down the pitch and he isn't coming back in from there
googly at a length outside off, leans in and drives to long-off
inside edge into pad. Googly tossed up outside off, he's anxious about this turning back in as he tries to push into the covers
oh nearly bowled like the last match. Short of a length googly ripping back in sharply from just outside off. Exposes all stumps and chops it very late to backward point
googly at a length on leg stump, spins across him and he can't get the flick into the leg side
googly at a length just outside off, backs away and has a swat. It's off the toe-end, down to long-off
full offcutter at leg stump. Makes room and has a swing at this, trickles out to deep square
leading edge over short third man. Short of a length ball gets big on him as he has a big heave on the front foot. Not elegant, definitely effective
slower ball, short of a length at off stump. Backs away and waits a long time for this legcutter to arrive. Can only slap it out to sweeper cover

he's got good bat on this, but he's also picked out long-on to precision. It's another slower ball from Kumara - he cuts down 20-30kphs on those from his average in the mid-140s. This one is floated up full on middle stump. Imad makes a lot of room and drills this over the bowler, flat. Long-on takes it with a reverse-cup with a couple of strides to his right
short of a length and cramping him at leg stump. Hurriedly whipped to long-on's right
beaten the under-edge. Slower short ball outside off, he waits and waits for the cut but this sneaks through from under the bat

dragged it straight to long-on! Arguably Pakistan's biggest hitter is gone second ball. This is a googly, but lobbed up very slowly outside off. He stays put in the crease because that's in the zone, but it appears he's too eager to send this a long way. The loopy delivery ends up coming off the toe-end and it's Wanindu again, clogging it up for Pakistan

just evades long-off! Another mis-hit, but there's just enough. Tossed up outside off, his feet are pointing midwicket, his head has whip-lashed into the fine leg direction, and his bat has turned. But he's managed to squeeze it over the boundary
googly cutting in, backs away and chops to point
inside edge onto pad as he teases with that slow googly. Outside off, Sarfraz wants to lace this through midwicket with a slog sweep. Can only get it pitch side off his pad
inside edge onto pad again. This is great from Wanindu, but not the greatest strategy from Sarfraz. Another slow googly outside off, another attempted slog

and now he's through him. Sri Lanka's newest star has put them on the brink. Short of a length, googly. Sarfraz static and upright this time - but still playing a slog. It's past the inside edge and tonks the top of off
muscles! That's what! Low full toss on off stump, stays very still and absolutely crunches this over this partner's head. Long-on didn't have a chance
slower ball at a length on off, backs away and slaps it firmly to long-off's left. Steals the second
short of a length and at the stumps. Another slower ball it appears. Waits on it and punches aerially, but with little force, out to long-on
length ball just outside off, shuffles and has a swipe at this. It comes back to the bowler on the bounce and he sticks his left hand out
full indipper at off stump. Keeps the front leg out of the way and times this nicely from inside the line, but it's along the floor to sweeper cover
beaten! Full and just outside off. Late swing in, but Wahab is still a long way inside the line as he has a swing at this
starts wide. Very wide and full outside off, left alone
yorker just outside off, drilled out to sweeper cover
crunches this over the bowler! Overpitched just outside off, not the greatest delivery, but some composure to send this there. Stood still and swung from underneath
sliced out to deep backward point. Full ball wide outside off, swishes underneath it but can't connect on this. The fielder allows that to come to him gently and lobs it back
won't get it. Full toss on leg stump, swings across this, gets it off the thick inside edge to deep midwicket
full and at the stumps. Clubs it down to long-on along the floor
out to sweeper cover. Short of a length slower ball on off stump, punches it along the floor to that fielder
